attributes.action: Withdraw UK support for any operations in Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
Correspondence from UK Government and Parliament:

Minster of State for the Ministry of Defence, told Parliament that "we have been involved in coalition operations against ISIL in Iraq, and we have supported our allies in their operations against ISIL in Syria—notably in surveillance operations." If you would like the UK to withdraw its support for any operations in Syria, you could start a petition asking for that.

Thanks,
The Petitions team
UK Government and Parliament
attributes.background: This petition follows a previously rejected petition to "Withdraw all UK forces from Syria and end UK involvement in the war" after it was deemed "not clear" what it was asking the government to do. They advised that I petition for "the UK to withdraw its support for any operations in Syria"

rejection.details: You might also find it helpful to use the text of the petition to explain why you want the Government to take this action.
